evidence.text: Person B: Rick the dick. I bet you he was married.

Person B: Retire?! Like, bankers retire. Waddaya think I have a 501k? I’m gonna work and then I’m gonna work some more and then I’m gonna die. I’ll probably die in my uniform. That’s my long-term plan.
Person B: It’s not an option, Jodie.
Person A: Isn’t it like, a requirement?
Person B: Esmee Rodriguez-- She’s 83, still cocktailing at the Paris.

Person A: It just seems like a wonderful time in life, I dunno, I just think it seems fun-- learning new things, you know, maybe taking up a new language--
Person B: You can’t learn a new language that late in life, the brain doesn’t work that way--
Person A: But you are one.
Person B: Yes, I don’t mind it. They amuse me. And then I drink and gamble on my own time.
Person A: No it’s not. He’s like our dad.
Person A: Well that’s not nice. I feel like we’re all kinda like a big family.
